rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {DEK9160%, MBA531%, MBA9006, MKF5916, MKF9550, MKT616, MKT6160, MKT9160, MKX9160, X3401%}

description: Marketing activities undertaken by business and non-business organisations; value exchange concepts and processes; the marketing concept from a strategic and applied perspective; development of corporate and marketing strategic plans; analysis of an organisation's SBUs, product strategies and product development; use of marketing decision making tools at both an applied and strategic level; distribution, pricing and communication mix strategies; services marketing, individual and organisational buyer behaviour, marketing research and market analysis; marketing management, implementation and control processes and procedures.
